        public boolean goBack()
        Make the player go to the last room he was in, if there is one
        Returns:
        True if the player went back to another room, false if there was no room to get back to

      • canTake

        public boolean canTake(Item item)
        Check if the player can take this item
        Returns:
        True if the player can carryh this item, false if he can't because it's too heavy (he may need to drop some other items)
